TextView.android:text: “Music doesn’t lie. If there is something to be changed in this world, then it can only happen through music”- Jimi Hendrix.
'Fashion is the armor to survive the reality of everyday life.' —Bill Cunningham
“My music will tell you more about me than I ever will”- Anonymous
Why be moody , when u can shake yo booty! , so let loose and grab this opportunity folks cause Footloose is back !!
“That’s one good thing about music, You can sing a song to a thousand people and they will sing back for a thousand reasons”- Dave Grohl
“A magician makes the visible invisible. A mime makes the invisible visible.”- Marcel Marcean.
Come with yo crew and show 'em peeps who owns the neighbourhood.
'Aam aadmi aur kavi mein, adhik na koi antar; maatr mukhrit kar sake man ki vyatha, bhawanaao ke swar.'
Dive in to the music, jive with your partner, go with the flow and make the crowd follow your thunder.
Pick up the coffee. Slam the poetry.
“Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot” - Charlie Chaplin
“Painting is easy when we don’t know how, but very difficult when we do.” ~ Edgar Degas
“Film making is a chance to live many life-times”
